cause.description:
We as a whole will promote the ideas of the greatest party to ever exist on Parliament Hill. We're flexible on the age but for sure young people should be into this great cause.
1. Promote Idealism Of The Liberals
2. Educate others on the ideas of the Liberal Party
3. Make Teens Interested In Politics
cause.mission: Promote the Liberal Party Of Canada
cause.name: 18 & Under Liberal Party Of Canada Support
